hotels.name: Waldorf Astoria Amsterdam
hotels.desc: Luxury canal palace hotel, 17th-18th century architecture, largest private garden with 10,000 spring tulips
hotels.longDesc: A stunning collection of six historic canal palaces along the Herengracht canal, featuring refined luxury accommodations and Amsterdam's largest private garden blooming with 10,000 tulips each spring.

hotels.name: Over-Amstel
hotels.desc: Historic farm turned luxury B&B, farm shop, restaurant, walking and cycling trails
hotels.longDesc: A beautifully restored historical farmstead offering bed and breakfast accommodations alongside a farm shop and restaurant. Extensive grounds perfect for leisurely walks and cycling, with a tree maze currently under development.

hotels.name: Hotel Greenside Texel
hotels.desc: Family-friendly hotel with garden and bike rentals near Texel beaches

restaurants.name: Testamatta
restaurants.desc: Soul-warming Italian cuisine, cozy neighborhood gem, authentic flavors
restaurants.longDesc: A warmly appointed Italian restaurant offering soul-stirring dishes that showcase traditional recipes and quality ingredients in a welcoming Amsterdam setting.

restaurants.name: Gifure Ramen Bar
restaurants.desc: Premium wagyu ramen, Japanese noodle craft, rich broths, Amsterdam Japanese
restaurants.longDesc: A dedicated ramen bar specializing in premium wagyu preparations, offering expertly crafted broths and noodles that elevate the traditional Japanese comfort dish.

restaurants.name: Omakase Amsterdam
restaurants.desc: Omakase sushi, chef-led experience, premium fish, intimate counter dining
restaurants.longDesc: An intimate omakase-focused sushi restaurant where skilled chefs guide diners through carefully selected premium fish and seasonal preparations at the counter.

restaurants.name: Europizza
restaurants.desc: Creative pizza, vegetarian options, fried chicken, artisan wood-fired
restaurants.longDesc: A creative pizzeria pushing boundaries with inventive toppings, vegetable-forward dishes, and house-made fried chicken in a casual Amsterdam setting.

restaurants.name: Bon Burger Bar
restaurants.desc: Smash burgers, sunny terrace, casual burger joint, al fresco dining
restaurants.longDesc: A casual burger bar known for perfectly executed smash burgers, featuring a bright sunny terrace ideal for relaxed outdoor dining and people-watching.

restaurants.name: Bacalar
restaurants.desc: Authentic Mexican cuisine, traditional recipes, vibrant flavors, Mexico City style
restaurants.longDesc: An authentic Mexican restaurant bringing genuine flavors and traditional recipes to Amsterdam, offering a taste of Mexico City's culinary depth.

restaurants.name: Calisto
restaurants.desc: Elevated Italian, octopus pasta, refined technique, upscale dining
restaurants.longDesc: An upscale Italian restaurant showcasing refined technique through elegant dishes, with standout octopus pasta dishes reflecting commitment to quality and presentation.

restaurants.name: Cafe Caron
restaurants.desc: Monthly changing menu, meat and fish, French bistro, seasonal ingredients
restaurants.longDesc: A French-influenced bistro with a dynamic monthly menu highlighting fresh meats and fish, celebrating seasonal availability and culinary creativity.

restaurants.name: Obistro Amsterdam
restaurants.desc: Classic French cuisine, traditional bistro fare, timeless flavors, cozy atmosphere
restaurants.longDesc: A classic French bistro serving traditional dishes with timeless recipes, offering an authentic Parisian dining experience in the heart of Amsterdam.

restaurants.name: Buffet van Odette
restaurants.desc: Sunny lunch spot, feel-good casual dining, neighborhood favorite
restaurants.longDesc: A beloved casual restaurant perfect for sunny lunches that feel restorative and joyful. Known for fresh, comforting food in a welcoming neighborhood setting.

restaurants.name: Cafe de Linden
restaurants.desc: Breakfast, drinks, and snacks, perfect for any occasion, versatile spot
restaurants.longDesc: A versatile neighborhood cafe serving excellent breakfast, refreshing drinks, and shareable snacks suitable for any time of day or mood.

restaurants.name: Saint Jean Bakery
restaurants.desc: Artisan bakery, fresh pastries, quality baked goods, neighborhood gem
restaurants.longDesc: A charming neighborhood bakery specializing in fresh, quality baked goods and pastries perfect for starting your day or a sweet afternoon break.

restaurants.name: Kitchen at Carmen
restaurants.desc: Stunning breakfast spot, beautiful ambiance, delicious elevated dishes
restaurants.longDesc: A visually stunning restaurant delivering an exceptional breakfast experience with beautifully plated, delicious dishes in an architecturally impressive setting.

restaurants.name: Kikkie Amsterdam
restaurants.desc: Great beers, smashburgers, cozy indoors, fun sunny patio
restaurants.longDesc: A casual neighborhood spot featuring excellent craft beers and quality smashburgers, offering both intimate indoor charm and vibrant outdoor seating.

restaurants.name: Buurt Cafe de Tros
restaurants.desc: Natural wine bar, delicious small plates, curated selections, neighborhood charm
restaurants.longDesc: A neighborhood wine bar specializing in natural wines paired with delicious, carefully crafted small bites in a warm, welcoming atmosphere.

restaurants.name: Counter Amsterdam
restaurants.desc: Counter-style casual dining, quality food, neighborhood gathering spot
restaurants.longDesc: A casual neighborhood restaurant offering quality food in an unpretentious counter-service setting perfect for a quick, delicious meal.

restaurants.name: Turbo Amsterdam
restaurants.desc: Casual dining favorite, neighborhood gem, local honorable mention
restaurants.longDesc: A casual neighborhood restaurant earning honorable mention status for its approachable dining and consistent quality in Amsterdam's food scene.

restaurants.name: Texel Brewery
restaurants.desc: Local brewery with family-friendly menu and outdoor terrace

restaurants.name: Beach Pavillion Kaap Noord
restaurants.desc: Beachfront pavilion at the northern tip with panoramic views

restaurants.name: Bij Jef Restaurant & Hotel
restaurants.desc: Cozy farm-to-table restaurant with local lamb and vegetables
restaurants.address: Herenstraat 34, 1797 AJ Den Hoorn Texel, Netherlands

restaurants.name: CafÃ© de Zeevaart
restaurants.desc: Traditional Dutch cafe with stamppot and local Texel specialties

experiences.name: Texel Island
experiences.desc: Island escape with wide beaches, sand dunes, bike paths, fresh seafood, car-free
experiences.longDesc: A perfect summer getaway just 1.5 hours from Amsterdam by train and ferry. Texel offers pristine beaches, rolling sand dunes, charming villages, and extensive bike paths ideal for car-free exploration.

experiences.name: Den Helder
experiences.desc: Ferry port town, gateway to Texel Island, North Holland coastal hub
experiences.longDesc: Coastal town serving as the main ferry departure point for Texel Island. A practical transit hub with direct train connections from Amsterdam.

experiences.name: Herengracht Canal
experiences.desc: Historic Amsterdam canal, iconic architecture, picturesque waterway lined with grand mansions
experiences.longDesc: One of Amsterdam's most prestigious and scenic canals, lined with magnificent 17th and 18th-century palaces and period architecture, offering quintessential Dutch golden age charm.

experiences.name: Antiek 58
experiences.desc: Charming antique store, perfect finds, delightful owners, curated treasures
experiences.longDesc: An exquisite antique shop offering carefully curated treasures with warm, welcoming owners who make the browsing experience genuinely delightful.

experiences.name: Tony's Chocolonely
experiences.desc: Premium ethical chocolate, fair trade, quality confections, conscious shopping
experiences.longDesc: A renowned chocolate brand dedicated to fair trade practices, offering premium quality chocolate and confections with a strong ethical mission.

experiences.name: Auto Drop
experiences.desc: Traditional Dutch licorice, candy selection, local sweets, iconic shop
experiences.longDesc: An iconic Amsterdam institution famous for authentic Dutch licorice and traditional candies, offering an authentic taste of local confectionery culture.

experiences.name: Tulip Fields
experiences.desc: Vibrant bursts of color bringing springtime to life
experiences.longDesc: Expansive fields bursting with color during springtime, offering one of nature's most spectacular and Instagram-worthy seasonal displays.

experiences.name: Amsterdam Boat Trips
experiences.desc: Family-friendly canal boat tour through Amsterdam's historic waterways

experiences.name: Strandpaviljoen Paal 17 Aan Zee
experiences.desc: Wide sandy beach perfect for young children with shallow waters

experiences.name: De Slufter
experiences.desc: Unique wetland nature reserve on Texel with walking and cycling trails through dunes and salt marshes

experiences.name: Strandpaviljoen Paal 9
experiences.desc: Popular beach location on Texel with facilities and beach pavilion
experiences.address: Hoornderslag 8, 1797 RT Den Hoorn Texel, Netherlands

kidFriendly.name: WOW Family Center
kidFriendly.desc: Children's camp and activity center, ages 3-8, creative play and exploration
kidFriendly.longDesc: A parent-approved family center where young children engage in creative play, artistic exploration, and discovery activities while parents enjoy Amsterdam's attractions.
kidFriendly.photoAttribution: WOW Family Center (the Pijp)- workshops, camps, parties

kidFriendly.name: Ecomare
kidFriendly.desc: Seal rescue center and nature museum perfect for young children

kidFriendly.name: Texel Sheep Museum
kidFriendly.desc: Working sheep farm where children can meet lambs and see cheese-making

a.name: Canals, Beaches & Tulips: A Dutch Family Adventure (8 Days)
a.description: Discover Amsterdam's whimsical canals and hidden playgrounds before escaping to windswept Texel Island for beach days, bike rides, and fresh stroopwafels by the sea.
